beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

steps.name: Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new Pipeline project: "'Pipeline project'"
Enter "'Pipeline project'" in the "Item Name" field
Click "Pipeline" project
Click "OK" button
Get the sidebar label text for the "Build Triggers" section
